div.div:
Huan - April 1, 2012 - Version 0.6.10
Great app but wont use all pictures in folder
This is such a great app that I bought the donation version. I have a folder of 100+ pictures and on random picture selections, only about 20 pictures were selected randomly and all others never showed up. I would change this to 5 stars if this could be fix or properly explained.

Jermaine - March 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.6.10
Epic 4g touch (Galaxy S2)
Nooooooooooo, I did the sprint update and now this app doesn't work! This is my favorite app, please fix it developer! (GS2 sprint)

Andy T - March 26, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 0.6.10
Love it...
Am happy to donate $1 for this app. Only wish would be animated gif support like hilly said. I know such a feature would probably be a resource hog, but with these new tablets and phones it wouldn't be an issue. Can you say quad-core 1.5ghz Tegra 3? Anyway.. thanks for the great app!!

Joanne - June 2, 2012 - Version 0.6.10
Great app
Just got the donated version. Great app. Worth it. Kudos to the developer. Just hope the could improve the memory usage for my phone. Optimus black.

Ferdi - May 9, 2012 - Version 0.6.10
Massive improvement
I haven't used this app since its first release.. and im very impressed with how much it has improved in performance ...thanks for this!!

t2jover - June 11, 2012 - Version 0.6.10
Solid App!
Have been using it since my first Android (Galaxy Tab 7) and have never changed to any other Wallpaper ever since. Don't think I'll switch to another :-) Is it possible to have a different picture for landscape and portrait mode? This is because my icon layout is at sync with the portrait mode picture, but when I have to use change to landscape, the beauty of the layout is lost. Still 5 Stars (or more if only possible)

Scott - April 12, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 0.6.10
Scott
THUNDERBOLT Verizon, Best wallpaper program out there!!! Works great !!!!! Just set up 8 screens, your 1st screen won't count or show up. That way the rest of the screens will be in correct order .

Brianne - April 4, 2012 - Version 0.6.10
It seems like a wonderful idea.. something I've been wanting forever, but I can't ...
It seems like a wonderful idea.. something I've been wanting forever, but I can't get it to work on my HTC rhyme.. :c help? Can't read website...

Sebastian - April 4, 2012 - Motorola Droid II with version 0.6.10
Perfect
Works perfect with two folders containing around 500 images combined, I rarely see the same image twice on random. I also love the separate image on the screenlock feature. Moto Droid 2 rooted

March 26, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 0.6.10
Awesome app
Add wallpaper for each screen and show whole picture without having to resize first. Nice!!!

Vivian - May 27, 2012 - HTC One X with version 0.6.10
Great
One of the best interchangeable wallpapers.

Tim - February 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.6.9
Perfect
I decided to donate to support the developer as this is a first class app. I use this on my Samsung Galaxy S2 phone and ASUS Eeepad Transformer with new ICS update. Highly recommended.

Oliver - March 4, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 0.6.9
Truly a masterpiece!
A small contribution to the developer for this great app! Works like a charm. And all without invasive permission requests! Just grand!

hilly - March 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 0.6.9
Love it!
Great on galaxy note with Zeam launcher. Only prob is the lock screen wallpaper doesn't work. Would love animated gif support too. Thanks!

John - March 10, 2012 - Version 0.6.9
Great App
Makes my tablet much for pleasurable to use. I have a variety of nice images on each page to cycle through related to which app hub that home screen hosts. New images on the news page, games shots on game page, sports on sports page etc. Great App!

Bry - March 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 0.6.9
Absolutely awesome but...
it sends my phone bonkers! Slows it down, switches off, lags and reloads continuously.

Toddimyre - February 21, 2012 - Version 0.6.8
Almost...
Great app! Works as intended most of the time. It has issues with low picture change settings, but works perfectly when set to 30 minutes. 10 minutes also seems to work fine, but I hadn't used it the whole day, so I wont post a good or bad review on it. Keep up the good work. Here's my dollar. :-)

Thanh - January 9, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF201 with version 0.6.8
Definitely a must do app if u hate how android scale/resize ur wallpapers The ...
Definitely a must do app if u hate how android scale/resize ur wallpapers The only really drawback is that higher quality walls 1mb± will increase the transition times such as switching between portrait and landscape.

Adnan - January 4, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 0.6.8
Free to donate
I have been using the free version on my various android devices for well over 1 year. Bought Asus transformer few months back and i think the developers need our support, so bought the donation version. Loved this wallpaper app. 5 stars P.s would like to see the option to use mp4 as well in future.

steve - January 26, 2012 - Version 0.6.8
Free & donation works Great Together
I have both the free & the donation. I can switch easily between the two. One for Family and one for Friends. Just as long as I don't get them mixed up ;-)

Sugix - February 23, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF201 with version 0.6.8
Very nice
Nice one. Working perfectly on Transformer Prime (need to adjust some configuration though) together with GO Launcher ^_^ Keep it up, looking forward for updates

Rob - February 2, 2012 - Version 0.6.8
Fixed my Wallpaper issue
This has solved my issue with setting Wallpapers on my Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 It works perfectly, keep up the great work!

Clarence - February 14, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 7.0 Plus with version 0.6.8
Was great
Until the update.now the pics don't change between screens because the app thinks the screens go up instead of to the sides. Please fix. Still 5* though. Galaxy tab 7 plus

KF - December 27, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 0.6.8
Support development but need more
Please add feature to limits multiple desktop use same image.

Shannon - February 7, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 0.6.8
Live
Cool

Neil - December 4, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 0.6.6
Love it. Oddly enough I chose this over a video background, which says a ...
Love it. Oddly enough I chose this over a video background, which says a lot. Thank You developer. Well done. :)

paolino - November 13, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.6.6
Excellent
Free version worked a treat, I bought it to support dev. Excellent app, thanks. Galaxy S2

Raheen - July 31, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 0.6.6
Great app! Just needs multiple folder support. After using free version I felt like ...
Great app! Just needs multiple folder support. After using free version I felt like I should donate since it's become my favorite wallpaper.

tom - July 25, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 0.6.6
Very good app, but not changing images between screens on my sensation

Roy - May 19, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 0.6.6
Works perfectly on my T-Mobile Galaxy S 4G
Works perfectly on my T-Mobile Galaxy S 4G (Froyo 2.2.1), Thanks. No problems. I paid for the donated version.

Rick - November 14, 2011 - Version 0.6.6
Fantastic!!
See my comment on the free version titled "Ante up the dollar, ya cheap-skates!". Good job. Thanks...

Mighty Mouse - August 17, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 0.6.6
Finally!!!!!!
Been looking for something like this since the g1 days. Thank you so much.

thethirdimpact - December 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 0.6.6
Awesome.
Support the dev!

Jeff - June 24, 2011 - Version 0.6.4
Getting better with each update now.

Smurf - June 18, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 0.6.3
Great app works fantastic on here desire if you turn off transitions between ...
Great app works fantastic on here desire if you turn off transitions between screens

Joeyjojo Jr. - June 13, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 0.6.1c
Worked beautifully until the last update, now doesn't work at all, just a blank ...
Worked beautifully until the last update, now doesn't work at all, just a blank background. Running CM7 on a Desire Z.

Richard - April 19, 2011 - Motorola Milestone2 with version 0.5.9
One word... outstanding! But got excited and bought it after five mins cos i'm ...
One word... outstanding! But got excited and bought it after five mins cos i'm that impressed. Hope it not a battery hog! Milestone 2.

overground - April 29, 2011 - Version 0.5.9
Devs that offer no advantages in donate version really deserve the donation. Great ...
Devs that offer no advantages in donate version really deserve the donation. Great app. Thank you!

Beeflin - April 28, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 0.5.9
An excellent idea, a different picture for each homescreen! Has every option you ...
An excellent idea, a different picture for each homescreen! Has every option you could ask for - there's even an add-on which shows pics from Picasa.

jared - June 14, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 0.5.9
It doesn't show all my pictures anymore. Update sucks!

Derry - April 27, 2011 - Version 0.5.9
A must have for the samsung galaxy...... anything... Lol

Sk Paul - May 8, 2011 - Version 0.5.9
I was searching for a app like this. At last my search has brought ...
I was searching for a app like this. At last my search has brought results.

mane - April 12, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 0.5.8
Love this app

Betty - March 20, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 0.5.7
Did not work.

Gareth - March 9, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 0.5.6a
My favourite wallpaper!

flame360 - March 4, 2011 - Version 0.5.5
Just what I needed works great

CobraJab - April 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note
Great app
Amazing app, does exactly what i've been looking for except one thing. I would like different sources for portrait / landscape mode. So you can have optimized pictures for each mode.

div.h4: Thanks for a great Wallpapers Apps!!

div.p: Thanks for a great Wallpapers Apps!!.. Before just installed with free version but since it's my fav apps so I installed with donate version. Nice bro..
